name: My First Dungeon
description:
A game all about keeping moving and running out of space!

Help the tavern keeper fill up his tavern by raiding infinite dungeons! Look out for dangerous traps and other obstacles!

Keep raiding dungeons until the tavern has run out of space or the ground disappears from underneath your feet.

Controls: 

Keyboard or controller, no mouse needed.

  • Move: WASD / Arrow keys / Left Thumbstick
  • Interact: E / X on gamepad (xbox)
  • Jump: space / A on gamepad (xbox)
